modName: Ushag Khazor - a powerful orcish follower
summary: An orcish warrior, strong and brave.
descriptionHtml:
It\'s my first little mod so be lenient :P


[SIZE=5][COLOR=#76923C]____________________________________[/COLOR][/SIZE]


[SIZE=20][COLOR=#76923C]Ushag Khazor[/COLOR][/SIZE] is a powerful warrior, heir of one of the most valorous Orsinium\'s  warriors, Mashag Khazor, who was a general under Gortwog gro-Nagorm\'s reign.

He heard about the legendary Dovahkiin, want to fight dragons and be part of his adventures.

He\'s very tall and powerful, [COLOR=#FF0000]LEVEL 35[/COLOR] and specialized in 2 handed fight.

You will find him in front of Breezehome, waiting after his mentor.

He loves skooma, do not hesitate to give him some bottle before the battle. :P

Hope you like him :P


[SIZE=5][COLOR=#76923C]____________________________________[/COLOR][/SIZE]


Installation
Directly via NMM or put UshagKhazor.esp in your data folder.


[SIZE=5][COLOR=#76923C]____________________________________[/COLOR][/SIZE]
author: Fraggy67100
